#7

::DeathStorm::

                 In his star-hopper, the assasin DeathStorm flies 
toward the planet 
                 known as earth. He had been hired by the predacons to 
assasinate
                 Liono 
                 Prime. DeathStorm chuckles to himself. This should be 
easy. And the 
                 pay was above average.

                 His face twists into an evil smirk as he continues on 
his way to 
                 ea

#8

Ramhorn:

                 ::Ramhorn watched as the last of the attacking 
Predacons went through the 
                 large hole that strange ant Predacon had dug, Ramhorn 
pulling out his 
                 sub-machine gun followed five minutes later::


#9

Inferno finishes the whole
                 Inferno: Alright now we can get into the base.
                 rampage gets to the control room door only to find it 
locked
                 Rampage: What is going on here? Open up this door!

#10

Shredder::

                 Shredder looks at the scanner at the maximal base. 
There seemed to be a mass of
                 energy signals off in the pred's direction.

                 He sends a transmission to Liono. "You've got a lot 
of preds around you, Liono,
                 do you want us to go help?"

If my idea to turn this into a cartoon catches on we;ll need as many 
posts as we can save.
